Posts.EditableText: Ok.  Using 4.03 on Vista. Created game in QDK in previous version.  Now when I use "Speak to" option, everything says "Gobbedly Gook!..."  I have a Standard Message set, but more importantly, I have a verb set for an object for Speak To with a message attached, but neither print... just "Gobbedly Gook".  Didn't have this problem before.  Anyone else come across this? Figure it out?

Posts.EditableText: Ok.  Things are a bit screwed up, but not much, as a result of messing around with things when I was having trouble with "abbreviated names."  But you should find what you need.  It's a fairly large file right now, but in the email I'll do my best to point out an example.  If you can read my recent thread on "Sounds" not working correctly, and look at that, that would be a great help too.
